ygData.subject: Custom Processors contructed multiple times

I was just looking in my heritrix_out.log, and I noticed some logging I had=
 put in my custom processor contructor was appearing 4 times at startup of =
heritrix. I had upgraded from a very old version of heritrix to 1.14.4 and =
I can only remember the logging appearing once on hertrix startup previousl=
y. 

I there any reason why the contructor of a custom processor would be i=
nvoked more than once, when heritrix is started up?
Thanks,
Peter.
